body: Hi Mostapha,  Thank you for your answer, how do you adjust the time of the year for the shadow study. Using the grasshopper file you sent me, I put sliders in the sun-path component, but the shadows are not changing (file attached).  [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/CE4srWD*11Z0l6JhBuq3fWSHrI5fAezCvklih33tXFrAxwYNAudkqAVgREssb6aV93d9oPZPWs-zroa9*Glx1dagcNv*jWDz/Capture.JPG)
